overview.summary: SphereModel builds a discrete unit sphere from a unit volume.

description.p: SphereModel recieves HexVolField, covering the unit volume as input. SphereModel generates as output a mesh convering the unit sphere. The new mesh contains only cells belonging to the unit sphere.

net.title: Sphere Model
net.p: A network using module SphereModel is shown in . The network generates a discretized sphere convering the unit volume.

section.title: Upstream
section.p: Module produces a discretized unit volume (represented as a Lattice Volume Field).
Module converts the unit volume from a LatVolField to a HexVolField (a LatVolField cannot represent a sphere).
SphereModel then generates a discretized sphere (represented as a HexVolField). Note that module is used to change the resolution of the discretized sphere.

figure.caption: Sphere Model Network. Also shown are module 's GUI and the discretized sphere rendered by module

section.title: Downstream
section.p: Module displays the discretezied sphere from scene-graph data produced by module
